alert.note: Alert for McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McDuffie, northwestern Columbia, Lincoln and central McCormick Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Wrightsboro to near Appling. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomson, Lincolnton, Elijah Clark State Park, Mistletoe State Park, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Wrightsboro, Lake Strom Thurmond, Dearing, Plum Branch, Broad River Campground, Sweetwater Park, Winfield, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Thomson Fire Department, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, Knox Scout Reservation, White Oak Campground and Boneville. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 181. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
